home.heySubtitle: Master's student in Computer Networks, aspiring to work in High Performance Computing and large-scale systems.
home.myMissionText: My mission is to deepen my expertise in computer networks and high-performance computing, and apply it to real-world large-scale systems.
home.aboutMe1: I started programming in 2020 with Godot, which introduced me to software development and problem-solving.
home.aboutMe2: I am currently a Master's student in Computer Networks, with a strong interest in High Performance Computing, system-level programming and distributed systems, and I aim to pursue a PhD.
home.aboutMe3: I mainly develop native software in C and C++, and use Python for prototyping, experimentation and tooling, with a strong focus on performance and efficiency.

technologies.title: Technologies I use.
technologies.subtitle: Over the years, I have worked with a variety of technologies. Here are some of the technologies I have experience with:

contact.title: Contact me.
contact.subtitle: I'm always eager to explore new opportunities and take on exciting projects. If you have a project in mind, or just want to say hi, feel free to send me a message.

labeli.description: During my years in the association, I held several leadership roles, including Secretary, President, and Local Coordinator, which allowed me to gain experience in organization, coordination, and responsibility.

ambigu.description: I am responsible for the IT infrastructure of the student association AMBiGU, a geology-focused student organization, ensuring the maintenance and proper functioning of its digital tools.

work.title: My Projects
work.subtitle: Here are all my projects displayed. You can find them on

takuzu2077.title: Takuzu 2077
takuzu2077.description: Implementation of the Takuzu game in C and Web3 as part of the 'Technological Project' course during the second year of the bachelor's degree. Game implementation, solver, history, graphical interface, and Web3 port.

webApp-image.title: Web App Images
webApp-image.description: Implementation of a backend/frontend web application as part of a student project, allowing image and GIF hosting and the application of filters.

scrabble.title: Scrabble
scrabble.description: Group project in Java aiming to implement a Scrabble game from scratch with various features: CLI interface, graphical interface, game modes (Normal, Blitz, Super Scrabble), customizable dictionaries, game history and save system, and many more options.

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Here, I share my thoughts, development experiences, and technical articles about my projects and the technologies I use.

takuzu.title: Takuzu 2077 - Development and Architecture
takuzu.description: A look back at the development of the Takuzu game in C with SDL2 graphical interface, automatic solver and Web3 port.
